name: 快餐车竞技场
descr: 关于这款游戏Foodtruck Arena, an unconventional mix of car combat and football game, combines two things that make the world go round:foodandsports.Join the colorful cast of food truck owners who - using their eccentric cars, quirky recipes, and love for food - try to change the stagnant world of gourmet cuisine, one meatball at a time.Take part in an unforgettable tournament, battle against formidable opponents, discover new recipes, and finally, climb to the top of the culinary world!Thrilling tournament modeA mode for lone wolves: take an in-depth look at the world of Foodtruck Arena through the best single-player experience.Crazy local multiplayerConnect with your friends, configure your rules, and go wild! The multiplayer mode allows you to create teams of up to 4 players, set up your preferred rules, choose your battle arenas, and much more.A colorful cast of playable charactersMeet the Foodtruck Arena players from all over the world and play through their character story modes to unveil their secrets!Pimp your ridePlay through various modes and personalize your cars!All's fair in food and war!During the match, make use of everything you’ve got: freeze your opponents, boost your speed, or leave greasy puddles of tomato sauce to hinder the others! Unlock the power-ups specific for each car to boost your chances to win.Be sure to wishlist the game in order to get notified about its release!
detail:
名称: 快餐车竞技场
类型: 休闲, 独立, 竞速, 体育
开发商: Cat-astrophe Games
发行商: Gaming Factory
系列: Gaming Factory
发行日期: 2021 年 7 月 2 日
review: 全部评测: 好评 (10) - 此游戏的 10 篇用户评测中有 100% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评 (10 篇中的 100%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Windows 7 64 bit
处理器: Intel Core i3 or equivalent (2.0 Ghz or above)
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: Any GPU with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities (2GB)
存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 10 64 bit
处理器: Intel Core i3 or equivalent (3.0 Ghz or above)
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: Any GPU with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities (4 GB)
存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
